text: Love in Jamaica (French: À la Jamaïque) is a 1957 French musical comedy film directed by André Berthomieu and starring Luis Mariano, Jane Sourza and Paquita Rico.Rège p.726 It is an operetta film, adapted from a stage work composed by Francis Lopez. The film's art direction was by Raymond Nègre. ==Cast== * Luis Mariano as Manoël Martinez * Jane Sourza as Annie Krüschen * Paquita Rico as Olivia de Montana * Gisèle Robert as Gilda * Fernand Sardou as Maxime de Sainte-Maxime * Darry Cowl as Pater noster * Frédéric Duvallès as Simon Legrand * Gaston Orbal as Le capitaine * Georges Aminel as Pépito * Bernard Dumaine * Christian Duvaleix * Maurice Nasil * Madeleine Suffel * Maurice Teynac * Louis Villor * Nono Zammit == References == == Bibliography == * Philippe Rège. Encyclopedia of French Film Directors, Volume 1. Scarecrow Press, 2009. == External links == * Category:1957 films Category:1957 musical comedy films Category:French musical comedy films Category:French films Category:French-language films Category:Films directed by André Berthomieu Category:Operetta films Category:1957 comedy films
title: Love in Jamaica
